thread.section_title: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of webuy.com
thread.title: Andrew K
thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Andrew K

author: Andrew K
title: Andrew K
text: I have bought a few things from CeX over the past couple of months and everytime the item is exactly as described. Even when one of my A-grade items didn't have all the accessories, a quick email to the customer support team solved that within a few days. Great service and items! Will definitely buy from again.
